Epic Expedition Excellence Award

Embarking on a whirlwind adventure of epic proportions, I set out to achieve the seemingly impossible: visiting all 50 states in the United States within the span of a single week. Armed with meticulous planning, an insatiable wanderlust, and a trusty road map, my journey kicked off with a burst of excitement and a mission to conquer the vast and diverse landscape of America.

From the bustling streets of New York City to the serene wilderness of Alaska, my cross-country expedition was a testament to both my determination and the incredible variety of experiences that the United States has to offer. Each state held its unique charm, whether it was savoring mouthwatering Texan barbecue in the heart of Houston or admiring the breathtaking natural wonders of Arizona's Grand Canyon. I found myself chasing sunsets along California's Pacific Coast Highway, immersing in the rich history of Massachusetts' Freedom Trail, and even catching a glimpse of the mesmerizing Northern Lights in the northernmost state of Alaska.

With a whirlwind of memories, a camera full of snapshots, and a newfound appreciation for the beauty and diversity of the United States, my record-breaking journey served as a testament to the boundless possibilities of adventure and the incredible tapestry of experiences that make up this vast and diverse nation. While the feat was undoubtedly challenging, the memories and stories from this epic journey will undoubtedly be cherished for a lifetime, proving that with the right spirit and determination, even the most audacious travel goals can be achieved.



$25,000 National Traveler's Association Grant for Record Travels

Grace Paszkiewicz, an intrepid explorer with a passion for the open road, received a transformative gift that would propel her on a global adventure like no other. A generous grant of $25,000 was bestowed upon her, fueling her ambition to travel to various nations and complete road trips at record-breaking speeds. With this financial boost, Grace set out to not only break travel records but also to forge unique connections with people and places around the world.

This grant was more than just financial support; it was a recognition of Grace's determination and her unwavering commitment to the thrill of the journey. With meticulous planning and a heart full of wanderlust, she crisscrossed countries, immersing herself in different cultures and landscapes, and setting new benchmarks for road trip enthusiasts worldwide. Whether it was navigating the winding roads of the European Alps, traversing the vast deserts of Australia, or exploring the historic highways of South America, Grace's adventures became a source of inspiration for travelers everywhere. Her story serves as a testament to the power of passion and perseverance, showing that when given the means, individuals like Grace can turn their dreams into reality and leave a trail of unforgettable road trip stories in their wake.
